title: A Shark Week Nami skin

replies.body: Would buy.

> [{quoted}](name=Zmuecat,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=2uKzPqlg,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-08-28T18:52:30.411+0000)
>
> Would buy.

Seconded.

> [{quoted}](name=RickyJuice,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=2uKzPqlg,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-08-28T21:03:56.435+0000)
>
> Seconded.

I would third that
Nami has sooo much artsy skin potential like Zyra but probably won't get half as many as she deserves.

Being an actual fish like creature from the sea, the art team can really just go "WE WANT TO GIVE NAMI A SKIN! Who's got some ideas?"

"Shark"
"Octopus"
"Giant Squid"
"Tropical fish"
"Swordfish"
"Mermaid"
"... Why the fuck are you saying mermaid, that's what she is"
"Sorry... Whale"
"Fisherwoman"
"Void tentacle monster"
"Deep sea"

Three hours later.
"We took a vote and we somehow decided on mermaid."

> [{quoted}](name=Zmuecat,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=2uKzPqlg,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-08-28T21:13:47.352+0000)
>
> Being an actual fish like creature from the sea, the art team can really just go "WE WANT TO GIVE NAMI A SKIN! Who's got some ideas?"
> 
> "Shark"
> "Octopus"
> "Giant Squid"
> "Tropical fish"
> "Swordfish"
> "Mermaid"
> "... Why the fuck are you saying mermaid, that's what she is"
> "Sorry... Whale"
> "Fisherwoman"
> "Void tentacle monster"
> "Deep sea"
> 
> Three hours later.
> "We took a vote and we somehow decided on mermaid."

IKR, now don't get me wrong they are pretty mermaid skins but lets be honest we wanted the other ones more.

And then there's Zyra. Over a million species of flower in the world and we somehow voted on fire? An actual league player? and a dead lady?

How about this, just make a skin from this
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Passiflora

And I will buy it by virtue of it being an actual plant.

> IKR, now don't get me wrong they are pretty mermaid skins but lets be honest we wanted the other ones more.
> 
> And then there's Zyra. Over a million species of flower in the world and we somehow voted on fire? An actual league player? and a dead lady?
> 
> How about this, just make a skin from this
> https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Passiflora
> 
> And I will buy it by virtue of it being an actual plant.

But that's so boring imo. 
Oh hey, Zyra is a plant-lady. Let's make her... a DIFFERENT plant! Applause, clap, good job boys.
It's like Lissandra's skins. Oh, let's give her... MORE SPIKY ROCKS, but red! I'd rather see a Lifebloom Lissandra, where her ult becomes a topiary garden.
Heck they could give her a bird skin and make it work.

> [{quoted}](name=Gorgannan,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=2uKzPqlg,comment-id=000100000003,timestamp=2015-08-29T03:06:04.856+0000)
>
> Heck they could give her a bird skin and make it work.

....Maybe her ult will be a flock of sea gulls?
Zuan invader Nami, would be alien like and mutant. Nami spawns legs for her taunt

> [{quoted}](name=BuzzinTate,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=2uKzPqlg,comment-id=000100000001,timestamp=2015-08-29T00:17:50.593+0000)
>
> Zuan invader Nami, would be alien like and mutant. Nami spawns legs for her taunt

what about a  regular  Alien nami? lol
lmfao
I want plumber Nami where she wears overalls, has a helmet with a light, a wrench or plunger for a staff and says sorry when she uses her W on an ally (Because it will be sewage water).
I still want an Arctic (beluga or narwhal) , Lion Fish, or Fisherman (Like Fizz) Nami skin.
Would her Tidal Wave just be a giant Urf Urf-ing along?
It looks cool, but I feel this would discourage one of my favorite ideas for a new a champion, a shark-type champion

Then please join me in the REAL battle : A DUCK!

We do not have a duck champion and that is a scandal. One of it's abilities could be 
"Passive: The duck's Quack appears not to produce an Echo, but in fact does and this stuns everyone for days"

Huhuhuhuh, he made a period reference.

Riot, nor myself, will never go for the name, the skin though, hella cool.
I've seen some good Nami skins; this one ranks up there.

Mershark Nami.

I need this. NOW!! Riot! You've got a moneymaker here!
i think deep water nami because shark isnÂ´t the best name to put on a skin

I like it but I like her spiked hair more than the bowl tupe, also the armor also feels a little bulky and disconnected from her. Give her a bit more armor maybe but not as chunky 
Otherwise great idea and art
I don't think my wallet can take anymore. Everything done for {{champion:267}} is just so on point.

> [{quoted}](name=TheYungHoneyDooo,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=2uKzPqlg,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-08-29T02:01:06.663+0000)
>
> I don't think my wallet can take anymore. Everything done for {{champion:267}} is just so on point.

Now if only she can get better AP Ratios then we'll all be in business.
Meanwhile Sona.... :'(
This looks amazing! Nice job!
Totally would buy. :)
We really need an evil Nami skin !
This is exactly what Nami needs. Makes her look dangerous and completely different from her other skins.
Yes, please. This is amazing. :D
this does fit for nami :P
Yep, I would love a darker nami skin. Current ones are a bit to happy for my taste.
Such an insta buy idea.
